import{withStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import InputBase from"@material-ui/core/InputBase";var PUCustomInput=withStyles(function(theme){return{root:{width:'100%',fontSize:'1rem',"label + &":{marginTop:theme.spacing(3)}},input:{fontSize:'inherit',borderRadius:30,position:"relative",color:'#838989',backgroundColor:theme.palette.pu.bg,border:"1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.23)",width:"100%",padding:"10px 25px",transition:theme.transitions.create(["border-color","box-shadow"]),"&:focus":{// boxShadow: `${fade(theme.palette.primary.main, 0.25)} 0 0 0 0.2rem`,
